t: Stanley 92-645 3/8-Inch Extendable Set - Stanley Extendable Ratchet - Amazon.com
s: I eventually ended up wanting an extendable ratchet of any brand. I am by no means handy, but find that the ratchet is one of the tools I use the most (besides a screwdriver). Before purchasing, I stopped by Sears, Harbor Freight, Lowes, and Home Depot for an in store comparison. Only HF and Sears had extendable ratchets. Harbor Freight- In all honesty, I was originally going to go with the HF option because I was mislead to believe it was extendable and had a flex head...
